item.title: Help with changing max item amount
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

uhm, this is caused by the binary system, alot of integers cant go much further then a cetain number of digits, so maybye 4 billion (10 digits) is too much for your integer (int), just don make it so much, btw item worths can be changed in items.java, just search for the ID and change the worth to whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with changing max item amount
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

when i change the int to long in maxitemamount i get these 2 errors

client.java:597: possible loss of precision
found : long
required: int
playerItemsN[i] = maxItemAmount;

client.java:620: possible loss of precision
found : long
required: int
playerItemsN[i] = maxItemAmount;

hw do i fix that?

Read full topic
